channel.title: Looking for a source (is this right section? .-.)
channel.description:
I dont know if this is too specific, because I'm new. :P
But.. I'm looking for a source that is edgeville bank based, with a donor zone type place, and then like a chill type area. I want the rest of the world, or a majority of it (Mainly around edge bank) to be pvp. It also needs to have spawn, and Id like it to be a really updated 317 or anything up to late 500s. I know some of this is specific, but ill take ANY help.
Thank you. Peace <3

item.title: Looking for a source (is this right section? .-.)
item.dc:creator: @jc22493 Jc22493
item.description:
@jc22493 wrote:

Ashley:

The Server Downloads board contains all the downloads you need.

smkscape:

If you cannot find it, here it is: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/board,49.0.html

Read full topic

item.title: Looking for a source (is this right section? .-.)
item.dc:creator: @ggaeth ggaeth
item.description:
@ggaeth wrote:

[quote=“oldschool-scape, post:2, topic:474903”]nop, not right section.
Kinda obvious when this section is called “Server help” and not “Server request”

U cant request… go look for some oldschool pk bases in the server download section, use the search bar…

I’m getting sick and tired of every single moron posting requests in the help or download section…[/quote]
no need to get mad, some people are new and you just have to respect that. >.> thanks for the small amount of information your pebble sized brain actually produced relating to my topic.

Read full topic
